name: Saltflats
role_in_state: primary salt producer and coastal transshipment margin
economy_niches: storage/distribution hub for imported ritual reagents
culture_adjustments: kinship organized around pan-work crews rather than boats
sea-calendar emphasizes dry/wet cycles for evaporation
work-songs and reef-chants adapted to pacing salt-harvest
fewer large guild halls; ephemeral field shrines common
constraints: ritual magic dependent on imported reagents
notes: salt pans require rotation to avoid permanent salinization
shoreline and shoal channels shift frequently; constant re-surveying
